Hi all,
I would like to have some help kantei this tsuba. It was fitted on a 
mumei wakazashi I bought.
http://hem.bredband.net/odrike/Tsuba5.htm

I have seen that Richard Turner have displayed some tsubas with same or 
similar design. Would the description of the design on this auction be 
accurate for my tsuba aswell?
http://www.double-dragon-ebooks.com/NihontoAuctions/QAViewItem.asp?ItemID=45 


Would it be possible to determine age or school? Akasaka has been 
mentioned for tsubas with same design. Could this one be an Akasaka?

Any information is appreciated even if you say itï¿½s a Chinese copy.

Regards,
Fredrik
